name: raycast(from:allowing:alignment:)
desc: Performs a ray cast, where a ray is cast into the scene from the center of the camera through a point in the view, and the results are immediately returned.
declaration: @MainActor func raycast(from point: CGPoint, allowing target: ARRaycastQuery.Target, alignment: ARRaycastQuery.TargetAlignment) -> [ARRaycastResult]
